title: Why am I a loner?
body:
Moved and went to a new school this year, first 5 weeks and I'm still alone. Thing is, I was always popular and even now people've been telling me I'm liked by a lot of grills but no one comes up to me, and I don't know their names or who they are if I do, so I can't talk to them. And I know a lot of guys, but they're all the type of friend that you only talk to occasionally, or they're assholes so I don't wanna get into their clique. What do I do? I feel like I'm "popular" but no one wants to talk to me ;___;


Edit: Why am I coming to a league forum for this, I have a side bitch for a reason.
